name: Complete Full Spine & Extremity Adjusting DVD Set
descr:
Practice to Lear - Learn to Heal "Full Spine & Extremity Adjusting Course DVD Series by Dr. Leonard "John" Faye.

Dr. L. John Faye revolutionized chiropractic technique of the spine, pelvic, and extremities in the early 1980s, and his videos, lectures, articles and advice have tought a generation of leading chiropractors, worldwide, how to succeed in practice.

These new digitally filmed DVDs, with over 6 hours of manipulation techniques for spine and extremity adjusting have updated viewing technology, multiple camera angles for easy and comprehensive learing, more palpations, more adjustments, with up close and detailed hands on demonstrations and are indispensible to any student or doctor of chiropractic.

These DVDs give you the opportunity to be mentored and expand your manipulation and clinical expertise with one of the worlds most noted chiropractic experts. "Practice to Master-Learn to Heal" and provide better care to your patiens and assure your practice succeeds.
